myths.title: AI Myths & Facts
myths.description: Discover the truth about artificial intelligence and learn facts that might surprise you

myth1.myth: AI will replace all humans at work
myth1.fact: AI will collaborate with humans, creating new types of jobs and increasing productivity in existing roles.

myth2.myth: AI is more intelligent than humans
myth2.fact: Current AI consists of specialized tools. They don't possess consciousness or general intelligence like humans.

myth3.fact: AI requires enormous amounts of high-quality data to learn and function properly.

myth4.fact: Modern AI solutions are becoming increasingly energy-efficient and help optimize energy consumption.

myth5.myth: AI is only available to large corporations
myth5.fact: More and more AI tools are becoming available to small businesses and individual users.

myth6.fact: AI can make mistakes and its decisions depend on data quality and algorithms. It requires human oversight.
